HDG.QB.content: nihilism consummated when seizes all subsisting resources, when nothing can assert itself as an exception anymore [oblivion of Being]: condition of normality a consequence of consummation (Vollendung) > essence of nihilism prevails in advance [destiny] of nihilistic phenomena, consummation not nihilism’s end: w/ consummation first begins final phase of nihilism

HDG.CCP.content: as release from transcendental re-presentation, Gelassenheit is a relinquishing of the willing of a horizon > this relinquishing doesn’t stem from a willing, except the occasion for releasing oneself to Gegnet “requires a trace of willing” > this trace vanishes while releasing oneself & is completely extinguished in Gelassenheit [annihilation of trace or absolute ash?]
